text: "Until the Day Is Done" is a 2008 song by alternative rock band R.E.M.. It was taken from their 14th studio album Accelerate. It was released as two-track download only track but went to number 49 in Switzerland. ==Track listing== #"Until the Day Is Done" – 4:09 #"Houston" (Live at the Apple Store, Regent Street, London, March 26, 2008) – 2:19 Category:2008 songs Category:R.E.M. songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Until the Day Is Done
